fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation, Single market
head_office_address: Place du Champ de Mars, 5 Bastion Tower Level 20
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: BELSIPA is a Member in EUSIPA, the European umbrella association for the issuers of structured products, and an Associate Member in FEBELFIN, the Belgian financial sector association.
goals__remit: BELSIPA is the association representing the issuers of structured products to retail and professional investors in Belgium. We strive to achieve a level-playing field for financial services in Belgium and a solid market standardisation of the industry, whilst supporting such efforts also on the European level. Beyond we seek to contribute to any efforts aiming at the promotion of investor and salesforce education in the local market place.
